channel.title: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64
channel.description:
Hi, I don't really know if it is a bug or a problem I only have, but using pitch bend when I reach + 64 value it goes down to - 64 value. I tried with a simple patch using just the bend object + sine + patcher keyboard and the problem is still there, does anyone experience the same problem?
I tried any combination possible using atenuator, mixer even the range limiter, allways when I reach the +64 on the bend of the patcher keyboard it goes to the -64 value
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64
item.dc:creator: @patatos angelo avogadri
item.description:
@patatos wrote:

Definitely an internal keyboard bug! It doesn't happen with an external one

Read full topic
item.source: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64

item.title: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Using Arturia Keystep, I get a range of -64 to +63.99.

Read full topic
item.source: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64

item.title: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64
item.dc:creator: @pauto
item.description:
@pauto wrote:

I just use it for what you said, testing when I don't have a keyboard arround.

It might be a bug just in the keyboard itself, I will try with a real keyboard to see if it happens also.

Thanks for testing it

Read full topic
item.source: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64

item.title: Pitch Bend Bug + 64 value acting like - 64
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

I never use the patcher keyboard, but this got me curious, so I tried.
I get the same result.

The Patcher Keyboard might sometimes be useful for testing, if you don't have a real keyboard available. Have you found a real use for it?

Read full topic
